product_name: Mammut T Aenergy GTX Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: The women's Mammut T Aenergy GTX Hiking Boots feature GORE-TEX(R) waterproof technology that's guaranteed to keep your feet dry when you're stomping through puddles and jumping across streams. Nylon mesh uppers with synthetic overlays have GORE-TEX waterproof, breathable membranes to keep your feet dry and comfortable in wet weather. Rolling Concept(R) design promotes a natural rolling of the foot while also providing good support and cushioning. Mammut Memo Foam is placed throughout the boots to pad the insteps, shinbones and ankles; foam adapts to your feet for an individual fit. Lining and padding system takes account of different areas of the feet to limit pressure, exposure to cold and perspiration. The women's Mammut T Aenergy GTX Hiking Boots have Vibram(R) outsoles with multidirectional lugs arranged in a scale formation for excellent traction.
short_description: The women's Mammut T Aenergy GTX Hiking Boots feature GORE-TEX(R) waterproof technology that's guaranteed to keep your feet dry when you're stomping through puddles and jumping across streams.
